name: pihla folk
subtitle: pioneering folk music and traditions since 2002
heroParagraph1: pihla folk is a pioneer in folk music and traditions through creative production and promotion activities.
heroParagraph2: We focus on Baltic Finnic traditions and languages with an emphasis on Karelia. Our modern approach encompasses both acoustic and archaic music as well as fusion.
additionalText:
Our deep knowledge and understanding of traditions, sensitive working approach, and diverse networks help us work successfully with cross-border and even controversial traditions.

Finno-Ugric culture is an essential, broader world. pihla folk's values stem from these roots, challenging our era's individualistic and fast-paced view of humanity and the world.
